name: Broccoli
properties: Checks off multiple optimal weight-loss ingredients
benefits: Broccoli with garlic sauce can incorporate at least half of the seventeen optimal weight-loss ingredients. Low glycemic load, high in fiber, anti-inflammatory, and low in calorie density. Part of cruciferous vegetables group which supports weight loss.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen - aim for cruciferous vegetables daily

quotes: A dish from the vegetable section, such as broccoli with garlic sauce, might incorporate at least half of them [optimal weight-loss ingredients].
